title: Rajasthan RPSC Various Post Online Form 2025
description: Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) Recruitment 2025 Apply Online for 12121 Post Post Update Date: 10-09-2025 Short Description: RPSC Various Post Recruitment 2025 for 12121 Post: A massive recruitment drive has been announced in Rajasthan, with 12,121 different posts available across various departments. This includes 1,015 positions for Rajasthan Police Sub Inspector SI / Platoon Commander 2025 , 3,225 posts for School Lecturer (School Education) PGT Teacher , and a significant 6,500...
